ingredients: 1 cup water, 1 cup white sugar, 1 (12 ounce) package fresh cranberries, 1  orange, peeled and pureed, 1  apple - peeled, cored and diced, 1  pear - peeled, cored and diced, 1 cup chopped dried mixed fruit, 1 cup chopped pecans,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 1g 3%, Sodium 100mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 13mg 65%, Calcium 24mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 220mg 5%
